parameter.name: updateInterval
parameter.label: Update Interval
parameter.description: Update time interval in seconds to request the status of the bulb while it is connected to the network.

parameter.name: useHeartBeats
parameter.label: Use Heartbeats
parameter.description: True to request continuous 5s heartbeats from bulb. Update interval is ignored when using heartbeats.

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: Interval in minutes between attempts to reconnect with a bulb that is no longer responding to status queries. When the bulb first connects to the network, it should send out a firstBeat message allowing OpenHab to immediately detect it. This is only as a back-up to re-find the bulb.
